Harris v. Matthews No. 479PA05

1. — •

2. Allowed 12/01/05 3. Denied 12/01/05

4. Dismissed as moot 12/01/05

5. Allowed for purpose of remand to COA for more thorough consideration in light of Tubiolo v. Abundant Life Church, Inc., 167 N.C. App. 324, 605 S.E.2d 161 (2004), disc. rev. denied, 359 N.C. 326, 611 S.E.2d 853, cert. denied, 126 S.Ct. 350.163 L. Ed. 2d 59 (2005) 12/01/05

1. Def’s (Matthews) NOA Based Upon a Constitutional Question (COA05-28)

2. Pits’ Motion to Dismiss Appeal

3. Def’s (Matthews) PDR Under N.C.G.S. § 7A-31

4. Pits’ Notice of Cross-Appeal

5. Def’s (Matthews) PWC to Review Order of COA
